OrgName.entry: THE CHIMNEY HOUSE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: Has a 'Meeting Room' space and a smaller 'Front Room' space available for hire. Suitable for professional, educational or social events, including business meetings, training events, product launches, private parties and catered functions. The Meeting Room can accommodate 20 boardroom style, 50 theatre style or 60 people standing. Facilities include full colour projector and screen, plasma screen, conferenece call facilities, AV equipment, flip charts, wi-fi and hardwired broadband.
